attributes.action: for the benefit of the club, fsg must change their transfer policy
attributes.additional_details: for the past 3 years we have seen only 2 players come into lfc that have had any impact on the 1st team, phillipe coutinho and daniel sturridge are those players, fsg have forked out alot money but fail to realise that its not working, therefore this petition will hopefully get the attention of fsg, the TC (transfer committee) have failed and are killing the club by not sealing the deals for top class internationals such as , costa, willian, sanchez, salah, konoplyanka, most importantly selling suarez was  unacceptable.
